changeSet.author: kcando
changeSet.sql:
IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_arena_records') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_arena_records GO
CREATE PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_arena_records @character_id dbo.id_t AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SELECT mode, rank, score, win, lose, draw FROM Arena_Records WHERE character_id = @character_id
SET NOCOUNT OFF
changeSet.rollback: IF EXISTS (SELECT * FROM dbo.sysobjects WHERE id = object_id(N'dbo.get_character_arena_records') AND OBJECTPROPERTY(id, N'IsProcedure') = 1) DROP PROCEDURE dbo.get_character_arena_records GO
